subject: Gangs
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Some question whether the N.B.A. has glamorized gangs by fining the Celtics star Paul Pierce $25,000 for a “menacing gesture” that resembled a gang sign.
snippet: Some question whether the N.B.A. has glamorized gangs by fining the Celtics star Paul Pierce $25,000 for a “menacing gesture” that resembled a gang sign.
